kv12.10:1.4: Sattamabhaviko puggalo nirayaṁ upapajjeyya, tiracchānayoniṁ upapajjeyya, pettivisayaṁ upapajjeyyāti?
kv12.10:1.6: Tena hi sattamabhavikassa puggalassa pahīnā duggatīti.
kv12.10:2.1_0: Saṁvaro kammaṁ tatheva asaṁvaro, sabbakammaṁ savipākaṁ, saddo vipāko, saḷāyatanaṁ
kv12.10:2.1_1: vipāko, sattakkhattuparamo puggalo sattakkhattuparamatāniyato, kolaṅkolapuggalo kolaṅkolatāniyato,
kv12.10:2.1_2: ekabījī puggalo ekabījitāniyato, diṭṭhisampanno puggalo sañcicca pāṇaṁ jīvitā voropeyya,
kv12.10:2.1_3: diṭṭhisampannassa puggalassa pahīnā duggati, tatheva sattamabhavikassāti.
